# Alert 消息

# 示例
# 代码
<lai-button @click.native="alert" type="ok">message</lai-button>
...
<script>
  let _uid = 0
  export default {
    ....
    alert () {
      const types = ['success', 'info', 'warn', 'error']
      this.$alert({
        content: 'There is one message',
        duration: 2000,
        type: types[_uid%4]
      })
    }
  }
</script>
